volunteer_experience.info: Fordham Investor Relations Association is a organization aimed at promoting Investor Relations profession, educating the students on different IR verticals and career paths and connecting the leaders of the community.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Fordham Investor Relations Association
volunteer_experience.title: Head Of Investor Relations

volunteer_experience.info: Team Leader in Incoming Global Exchange Department in AIESEC in Delhi University for Project "Global Village". The project comprised of events like painiting competetion for slum kids, newspaper collection drive for collecting revenue for NG', cultural events at New Delhi Institute of Management, an event for School kids by Foreign interns at Vivakanda School, East Delhi. The main event involved participation of 200+ foreign students for a culutual event at Select City Walk, South Delhi.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: AIESEC in Delhi University
volunteer_experience.title: TEAM LEADER

volunteer_experience.info: Interned in Aarohan Ngo in the month of Nov- Dec, 2011. I worked on the research project on Juvenile Justice and conducted surveys & research as a part of the internship for the betterment and welfare of children living in Slums in Delhi.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Aarohan NGO
volunteer_experience.title: INTERN
